subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: St. Nicholas Abbey, who won the Breeders’ Cup Turf in 2011 and five other top-level races in a five-year career, died after a bout of colic at 7.
snippet: St. Nicholas Abbey, who won the Breeders’ Cup Turf in 2011 and five other top-level races in a five-year career, died after a bout of colic at 7.
